name: Xrp Classic
description: Xrp Classic's purpose is to develop eco-friendly solutions that aim to make the cryptocurrency space safer and easier to understand for everyone. Xrp Classic is a project aimed at developing its own ReFi blockchain. Our vision is to develop an innovative, sustainable, multi-platform ecosystem that enables users to earn whilst having  a pleasant experience using it. In addition, $XRPC is a hyper-deflationary token with an ecosystem-integrated Smart Exchange System.
